title: Facebook will soon let you add video profile pics and bios written in emoji
text:
Facebook will soon let you add video profile pics and bios written in emoji 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Facebook's redesigning profile pages for the first time in a long time. The most noteworthy new features? Animated profile pictures, a spot ...
